text_block_list.text:
It's been quite the ride with Gold Ship 
in her quest for Eden so far, but—

We somehow managed to 
get ready for her debut…

If there's anything to be concerned
about, it's Gold Ship's mood. However—

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's it! 
Awesome, go for it!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Now when's she gonna shake…! Aaah, I can't look away from this!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Huh? What, you say? A chihuahua 
through a chikuwa.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
There are things to be learned by
peering through the narrow field of view
of the chikuwa's hole.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
That chihuahua must have thought long
and hard about the timing to give its
paw.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The same way horsegirls think about when
to start spurting, how to make their
moves.

I'm not sure I follow but it seems 
Gold Ship is thinking about the race 
in her own way… I believe?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Yooo what the, she went with down instead! You're supposed to shake!

Either way for now it seems all I can do 
is pray she takes the race seriously…!
